full_summary:
=====================================

### Invitation to Tender: General Contractor (GC) Services for Alert GAW Observatory Retrofit Project

#### Solicitation Number: WS3791642239

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites contractors to submit proposals for General Contractor (GC) Services for the Alert GAW Observatory Retrofit Project. The project involves renovation of the New GAW Observatory, construction of a new steel tower adjacent to the renovated building, and relocation of existing specialized equipment in Alert, Nunavut.

#### Key Dates

*   Amendment date: 2023-05-10
*   Tender closing date: 2023-05-16T14:00:00 EDT
*   Expected contract start date: 2023-08-03
*   Expected contract end date: 2025-03-15

#### Contract Requirements

The contract requires bidders to demonstrate expertise in non-residential building construction services (UNSPSC 72120000). The project is subject to the Directive on Government Contracts, Including Real Property Leases, in the Nunavut Settlement Area. Bidders must be registered on the Inuit Firm Registry (IFR) to participate in this solicitation.

#### Communication and Bidders’ Conference

Bidders are requested to communicate with the Contracting Authority before the conference to confirm attendance. A Bidders’ Conference will be held via Microsoft Teams on Thursday, April 27, 2023. This requirement is contained in the amended documents.

#### Security Clearance

This solicitation requires security clearance.

#### Documents and Attachments

Please note that all required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2023-05-16 at 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will be declared non-responsive. You can access the solicitation and amendment documents through Ariba Discovery (http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16031948?extsite=MTYwMzE5NDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
